name: photosphere-frontend
description: The frontend for the Photosphere application.

scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_MODE=readwrite AUTH_TYPE=auth0 BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000 GOOGLE_API_KEY="" webpack serve --open
scripts.start:demo: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_MODE=readonly AUTH_TYPE=no-auth BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000 GOOGLE_API_KEY="" webpack serve --open
scripts.start:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_MODE=readwrite AUTH_TYPE=auth0 BASE_URL=https://photosphere-api.codecapers.com.au GOOGLE_API_KEY="" webpack serve --open
scripts.start:prod:localbe: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_MODE=readwrite AUTH_TYPE=auth0 BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000 GOOGLE_API_KEY="" webpack serve --open
scripts.start:no-open: cross-env NODE_ENV=development AUTH_TYPE=no-auth BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000 GOOGLE_API_KEY="" webpack serve

author: ashley@codecapers.com.au
